mapper.sql: customerid, sku, active_flag, addtime, addwho, allocationrule, alternate_sku1, alternate_sku2, alternate_sku3, alternate_sku4, alternate_sku5, cube, defaulthold, defaultreceivinguom, defaultshipmentuom, descr_c, descr_e, edittime, editwho, firstinbounddate, grossweight, inboundlifedays, lotid, netweight, onestepallocation, outboundlifedays, overrcvpercentage, overreceiving, packid, price, putawayrule, qtymax, qtymin, replenishrule, reservecode, reservedfield01, reservedfield02, reservedfield03, reservedfield04, reservedfield05, rotationid, skuhigh, skulength, skuwidth, sku_group1, sku_group2, sku_group3, sku_group4, sku_group5, softallocationrule, tare
mapper.insert:
insert into Bas_Sku( customerid, sku,
descr_c,
descr_e,
active_flag,
alternate_sku1,
alternate_sku2,
alternate_sku3,
reservedfield01,
reservedfield02,
reservedfield03,
packid,
grossweight,
cube,
price,
netweight, tare, skuhigh, skulength, skuwidth, addtime, addwho, edittime, editwho, lotid, softallocationrule, allocationrule, rotationid, replenishrule, putawayrule, defaulthold, defaultreceivinguom, defaultshipmentuom, inboundlifedays, outboundlifedays, onestepallocation, overrcvpercentage, overreceiving, qtymax, qtymin, reservecode, shelflifetype, sku_group1 ) values( upper(#{customerid}), upper(#{sku}),
#{descrC},
#{descrE},
#{activeFlag},
#{alternateSku1},
#{alternateSku2},
#{alternateSku3},
#{reservedfield01},
#{reservedfield02},
#{reservedfield03},
#{packid},
#{grossweight},
#{cube},
#{price},
0, 0, 0, 0, 0, sysdate, #{addwho}, sysdate, #{editwho}, 'STANDARD', 'STANDARD', 'STANDARD', 'STANDARD', 'STANDARD', 'STANDARD', 'OK', 'EA', 'EA', 0, 0, 'Y', 0, 'N', 99999999, 0, 'IN', 'N', #{sku} )
mapper.update: update Bas_Sku set active_flag=#{activeFlag}, alternate_sku1=#{alternateSku1}, alternate_sku2=#{alternateSku2}, alternate_sku3=#{alternateSku3}, cube=#{cube}, descr_c=#{descrC}, descr_e=#{descrE}, edittime=#{edittime}, editwho=#{editwho}, grossweight=#{grossweight}, packid=#{packid}, price=#{price}, reservedfield01=#{reservedfield01}, reservedfield02=#{reservedfield02}, reservedfield03=#{reservedfield03} where customerid=upper(#{customerid}) and sku=upper(#{sku})

update Bas_Sku set
activeFlag=#{activeFlag},
alternate_sku1=#{alternateSku1},
alternate_sku2=#{alternateSku2},
alternate_sku3=#{alternateSku3},
alternate_sku4=#{alternateSku4},
alternate_sku5=#{alternateSku5},
cube=#{cube},
descr_c=#{descrC},
descr_e=#{descrE},
edittime=#{edittime},
editwho=#{editwho},
grossweight=#{grossweight},
packid=#{packid},
price=#{price},
reservedfield01=#{reservedfield01},
reservedfield02=#{reservedfield02},
reservedfield03=#{reservedfield03},
reservedfield04=#{reservedfield04},
reservedfield05=#{reservedfield05},
reservedfield06=#{reservedfield06},
reservedfield07=#{reservedfield07},
reservedfield08=#{reservedfield08},
reservedfield09=#{reservedfield09},
reservedfield10=#{reservedfield10},
reservedfield11=#{reservedfield11},
reservedfield12=#{reservedfield12},
reservedfield13=#{reservedfield13},
reservedfield14=#{reservedfield14},
reservedfield15=#{reservedfield15},
reservedfield16=#{reservedfield16},
reservedfield17=#{reservedfield17},
reservedfield18=#{reservedfield18},
sku_group1=#{skuGroup1},
sku_group2=#{skuGroup2},
sku_group3=#{skuGroup3},
sku_group4=#{skuGroup4},
sku_group5=#{skuGroup5},
sku_group6=#{skuGroup6},
sku_group7=#{skuGroup7},
sku_group8=#{skuGroup8},
sku_group9=#{skuGroup9},
where customerid=#{customerid} and sku=#{sku}
mapper.delete: delete from Bas_Sku where customerid = upper(#{customerid}) and sku = upper(#{sku})
mapper.select: select from Bas_Sku where customerid = upper(#{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and sku = upper(#{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select
from Bas_Sku
order by customerid,sku

select customerid,sku,alternate_sku1,packid,cube,grossweight,price from ( select customerid, sku, alternate_sku1, packid, ifnull(cube,0) * #{qty,jdbcType=NUMERIC} as cube, ifnull(grossweight,0) * #{qty,jdbcType=NUMERIC} as grossweight, ifnull(price,0) * #{qty,jdbcType=NUMERIC} as price from Bas_Sku where customerid=upper(#{customerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and sku=upper(#{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
